title: I have noticed that officers with the Wilmington Police Department do not wear hats when they are at an accident location or when they have a car pulled over. The Highway Patrol and the New Hanover County Sheriff\'s Department officers always are wearing their hats. Why doesn\'t the WPD?
text:
And here's your answer:

It's not a required part of their everyday uniform, according to our
police reporter. The only time the hats are required are during formal
events the police are taking part in.
